crypto-app.title: Crypto App
crypto-app.description: A list of cryptos with their prices and additional information. You can connect your Metamask wallet and preview your balance.

mag-thebay.title: Mag-Thebay ONG Site
mag-thebay.description: A site for the Mag-Thebay ONG. It is a single page application with a list of projects posted with MDX.
